# Badges for repositories

See [REPOSITORY.md](../../REPOSITORIES.md) for more information.

## Scope

<!-- 

Tip: to generate the "scope" badges, we use the [shields.io](https://shields.io/) service. For example:

https://img.shields.io/badge/Falco-core-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,


Once the SVG is generated and saved, then we need to center the logo (from y="7" to y="5").

-->


| Scopes | 
| --- |
| [![Falco Core Repository](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/repos/badges/falco-core-blue.svg)](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/REPOSITORIES.md#core-scope) |
| [![Falco Ecosystem Repository](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/repos/badges/falco-ecosystem-blue.svg)](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/REPOSITORIES.md#ecosystem-scope) |
| [![Falco Infra Repository](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/repos/badges/falco-infra-blue.svg)](https://github.com/falcosecurity/evolution/blob/main/REPOSITORIES.md#infra-scope) |
